channel.title: KQED-FM: KQED's The California Report Podcast
channel.description: KQED's statewide radio news program, providing daily coverage of issues, trends and public policy decisions affecting California and its diverse population.

item.title: The California Report Magazine
item.description: As big money floods into online entertainment, a growing number of people can make a living off of YouTube — and production companies are cropping up to help them realize the dream. Also, we look at a new series of original plays tackling the topic of hunger.
item.itunes:summary: As big money floods into online entertainment, a growing number of people can make a living off of YouTube — and production companies are cropping up to help them realize the dream. Also, we look at a new series of original plays tackling the topic of hunger.
